segments.text: Peter , wash your hands first , and then have some dessert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , can I have some ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not today , Honey . Don't eat too much ice cream .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , can I have one more piece of cake ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . The last piece is for your dessert . We're having dinner soon .
segments.speaker: S1
